# position

**Instance Property**

The translation applied to the node. Animatable.

## Declaration

```swift
var position: SCNVector3 { get set }
```

## Discussion

The node’s position locates it within the coordinate system of its parent, as modified by the node’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNNode/pivot] property. The default position is the zero vector, indicating that the node is placed at the origin of the parent node’s coordinate system.

You can animate changes to this property’s value. See [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/animating-scenekit-content].
